author: A_Brickset_user
title: much for less
review:
I really like this xpod
the other ones did not 
this is a easy way to get slope-bricks
and some orange with are rare in common lego boxes
i played with my tree friends the catapult game
(everyone a other pod)
and it just play great
we had weaks of fun
buy it if you see it!

willem, play on

author: BionicleBOOM
title: Man do I miss it.
review:
This was the other X-Pod that I gave my little brother. Like the Wild Pod, it ended up in the LEGO box.  I remember it being a very playable set, though, with lots of alternate models.

Pros:

-Alternate models

-X-Pod canister

-Pieces

Cons:

-None

Overall
5/5.  Great set, see if you can get it.
